message.title: Breached password message
message.description: Message text shown to the user when a breached password is detected.
message.default:
This password has previously appeared in a data breach.

It has appeared {PRETTY-COUNT} time(s).

Please use a more secure alternative.

warnOnly.title: Warn only
warnOnly.description: Only warn the user if their password is breached (i.e. don't stop them using the password).

clearPasswords.title: Clear password fields
clearPasswords.description: If a password is breached, the password field is cleared, forcing the user to type a new, more secure password.

failurePercentage.title: Aggression
failurePercentage.description: How aggressive Pappwords should be when assessing passwords in a form (e.g. if 100% then all 3 passwords in a form would need to be breached before showing the breached dialog).
